title: Vase hollondais nouveaux (lower vase)
description: Vase hollondais nouveaux (lower vase); Painted by Jacques-François-Louis de Laroche (French, about 1740 - about 1802), Gilded by Antoine-Toussaint Cornaille (French, 1735 - 1812), Sèvres Manufactory (French, 1756 - present); Sèvres, France; 1785; Soft paste porcelain; blue céleste ground color; polychrome enamel decoration and gilding; 10.5 × 15.6 × 12.1 cm (4 1/8 × 6 1/8 × 4 3/4 in.); 83.DE.341.2.1; J.
